com.marklogic.hub

Interface HubProject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HubProjectImpl

    public interface HubProject
    Creates and gathers information about a hub project. This handles what is initially created on disk for the project.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • init

        void init(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customTokens)
        Initializes a directory as a hub project directory. This means putting certain files and folders in place.
        Parameters:
        customTokens - - some custom tokens to start with

      • upgradeProject

        void upgradeProject()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Performs an upgrade to a pre-4.0 project by copying folders to their new positions as defined in hubproject.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problem happens with the on-disk project.
